entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is sitting in bed and talking to his friends about the prophecy.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is present during the conversation. She seems frightened by something.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another friend of Harry's who is present during the conversation.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character mentioned in the story. He told Harry to do something, but it is not clear what that was.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an organization where something happened with a prophecy.

entities.name: prophet
entities.description: The Prophet is mentioned as having information about the prophecy.

relationships.description: Harry is talking to Ron and Hermione about the prophecy.
